title: Ep 141 - The Cat Phone
description: The boys pretty muchcovered everything you care about in today’s episode. They talked about The Batman, The Outsider on HBO, British accents, creative GoFundMe campaigns, real-life superheroes, the 1904 Olympics, early automobiles in Ohio, Ben Franklin, The Spanish Civil War, weaponized monkeys. The Opium Wars and medical science in the Middle Ages. Another well-rounded episode. Enjoy.
